title: Protection of Specified Persons Against the Fraudulent and Exploitative Conveyance of Property Interests
subject: subject index

abstracts.abstract: Protection of Specified Persons Against the Fraudulent and Exploitative Conveyance of Property Interests;  Revising the list of persons who must report abuse, neglect, or exploitation of vulnerable adults to include the clerk of the court; requiring that any deed or instrument purporting to convey real property or an interest therein be executed in the presence of a specified number of independent witnesses; authorizing a specified adult to file with the clerk the contact information of a trusted person; requiring the clerk to refer an objection to a not-for-profit legal aid organization to investigate whether the deed or instrument was obtained through fraudulent or exploitative means, etc.

actions.description: Referred to Judiciary; Appropriations Committee on Criminal and Civil Justice; Rules
